item.title: {golem}
item.description:
{golem} is an opinionated framework for building production-grade shiny applications.

More documentation on {golem} website here

item.title: {golem} 0.1.0 has been released on CRAN
item.description:
golem (v0.1) A Framework for Building Robust Shiny Apps:

  • {golem} on CRAN
  • {golem} no GitHub
  • pkgdown and vignettes
